title: ITV SPIKA NG125-W1H Water-Cooled 143 LB Half Dice Cube Undercounter Ice Maker
description:
ITV SPIKA NG125-W1H Features

Undercounter Ice Maker
Produces up to 143 LB of half dice cube ice every 24 hours
Integrated Storage Bin capacity up to 44 LB of ice
Self-contained, Water-cooled condenser
304 Stainless Steel Box-Frame Construction
21.13" wide
31.25" high
Uses R404a refrigerant
115 Volt/60Hz/1-Phase electrical
Electromechanical timer and thermostat
External mounted on/off switch
Seal-less pump outside ice zone

 
ITV SPIKA NG125-W1H Ice Style

Half Dice cube ice cools beverages quickly due to its high surface area to volume ratio
Half Dice cube ice measurements: 1" x 1/2" x 1"
Ideal for beverage and dispensing applications

 
ITV SPIKA NG125-W1H Benefits

Plug-and-play installation with NEMA Plug Type 5-15P
Water Distributor increases resistance to scale buildup - removable for cleaning
Removable top cover gives user quick access to ice/wash switch and electrical box
Designed for easy access to machine internals for service
Legs adjustable between 6" and 6.5"
Integrated Ice Storage Bin - insulated (non-refrigerated) with polyurethane foam for lower heat transmission


ITV SPIKA NG125-W1H Certifications

title: ITV SPIKA NG125-W1H Water-Cooled 143 LB Half Dice Cube Undercounter Ice Maker
ITV SPIKA NG175-A1F Air-Cooled 192 LB Full Dice Cube Undercounter Ice Maker
description:
ITV SPIKA NG175-A1F Features
Undercounter Ice Maker
Produces up to 192 LB of Full dice cube ice every 24 hours
Integrated Storage Bin capacity up to 81 LB of ice
Self-contained, Air-cooled condenser
304 Stainless Steel Box-Frame Construction
26" wide
33" high
Uses R404a refrigerant
115 Volt/60Hz/1-Phase electrical
Electromechanical timer and thermostat
External mounted on/off switch
Seal-less pump outside ice zone
ENERGY STAR Qualified unit


ITV SPIKA NG175-A1F Ice Style
Full Dice cube ice cools beverages quickly due to its high surface area to volume ratio
Full Dice cube ice measurements: 1" x 1" x 1"
Perfect for all types of cocktails, retail, and dispensing

ITV SPIKA NG175-A1F Benefits
Plug-and-play installation with NEMA Plug Type 5-15P
Uses only 2.38 gallons of water per hour for ice production
Water Distributor increases resistance to scale buildup - removable for cleaning
Removable top cover gives user quick access to ice/wash switch and electrical box
Designed for easy access to machine internals for service
Front ventilation permits built-in installation
Legs adjustable between 6" and 6.5"
Integrated Ice Storage Bin - insulated (non-refrigerated) with polyurethane foam for lower heat transmission


ITV SPIKA NG175-A1F Certifications
